alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:46PM CDT until July 21 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JASPER...SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON...CLARKE AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 946 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Meehan to near Snell, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Meehan and Savoy around 950 PM CDT. Middleton around 955 PM CDT. Sykes around 1000 PM CDT. Crandall around 1010 PM CDT. Quitman around 1015 PM CDT. Rose Hill and Orange around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Chunky and Hickory. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
